ygData.subject: Re: Staff Segments - E. Karanas and Hpk
ygData.msgSnippet: By the sounds of it, this is not the Jagged pine crook. The parts for the jagged pine crook are fond on hunter gnolls in the Qeynos Hills.  I have heard of
ygData.messageBody:
By the sounds of it, this is not the Jagged pine crook. The parts for the
jagged pine crook are fond on hunter gnolls in the Qeynos Hills. I have
heard of this second staff quest, but am unsure on how to complete it. There
3 parts, I know that much....(I dont have all 3, only two, but my firend has
the third part on another server but not one of the ones I have).

----- Original Message -----
From: Rus <icekool@...>
To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 3:25 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Quest] Staff Segments - E. Karanas and Hpk


> From: Rus <icekool@...>
>
> I believe that is the JaggedPine Crook Peices go to the Druid GM in
SureGlade
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Crystal Jeffreys-O'Lyne [SMTP:cobaltwolf@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 6:32 AM
> To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Quest] Staff Segments - E. Karanas and Hpk
>
> From: Crystal Jeffreys-O'Lyne <cobaltwolf@...>
>
> In E. Karanas there is a named bandit that you can kill, he drops a
> staff segment and a hpk bank key. Upon turning in the key you recieve
> another staff segment. Does anyone know what you do with these items.
>
> Thanks
